Love the concept. For my setup (Brave browser, Debian, with uBlock Origin), first click of a video shows the usual like button and number, with an added dislike button (no number). Only after REFRESHing the page do you see a number beside the dislike button, and the ratio bar below. 
So, isn't a passive app that always works, but after an input step, does exactly what it's supposed to. Very useful app and something the internet sorely needed. To the maker - THANK YOU for returning an aspect o... Show more
